channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 大规模削减开支使法国政府难以筹集资金，用于向乌克兰提供多达 30 亿欧元的一揽子军事援助
item.description: Massive spending cuts have left the French government struggling to put together funding for a package of as much as €3 billion in military aid to Ukraine trib.al/zDa3EVe

item.title: 一家连续三年跑赢加拿大公司债券市场的对冲基金正在买入长期债券，因为预计加拿大央行将自 2020 年以来首次降息。
item.description: A hedge fund that outperformed the Canadian corporate bond market three years in a row is buying up longer-term notes in anticipation the Bank of Canada will make its first rate cuts since 2020 trib.al/Z6fkEKT

item.title: 巴克莱银行用四个小时公布了其削减成本、增加收入的三年计划。说到底，投资者真正关心的只有一件事：资本回报。
item.description: Barclays spent four hours unveiling its three-year plans for shedding costs and boosting revenue. At the end of the day, investors really only cared about one thing: capital returns. trib.al/ZQfd1Qt

item.title: 周五工作落后？以下是提高工作效率的 4 个建议
item.description: Lagging at work on Fridays? Here are 4 tips to improve your productivity trib.al/6RcB9G0

item.title: 宏观对冲基金和股票对冲基金今年押注日本，预测日本央行将在八年负利率之后改变政策
item.description: Macro and stock hedge funds are betting on Japan this year, predicting the central bank will shift its policy after eight years of negative interest rates trib.al/2eaPG8w

item.title: 本周在红海遭到胡塞武装导弹袭击时被船员遗弃的一艘商船至今下落不明
item.description: It’s still unclear what's become of a commercial ship that was abandoned by its crew during a Houthi missile strike in the Red Sea this week trib.al/C5kbJTv

item.title: 受并购持续升温的刺激，本周美国企业债券市场预计将有超过 500 亿美元的新债从投资级公司出售
item.description: The US corporate-bond market is expected to see more than $50 billion of new debt sales this week from investment-grade companies, spurred by the continued pickup in mergers and acquisitions trib.al/Ds7rzL1

item.title: 埃及打赌，与国际货币基金组织（IMF）达成的一项解决外汇危机的协议将有助于埃及清偿拖欠外国石油公司的款项
item.description: Egypt is betting that an agreement with the IMF to resolve a foreign currency crisis will help it settle money owed to foreign oil companies trib.al/Ygm9H7e

item.title: 打造美国电池产业面临的挑战
item.description: These Are the Challenges of Building a US Battery Industry trib.al/1gVNoLj

item.title: 学院派学者特奇尔发出警告，股市孤熊脱颖而出
item.description: Lone stock-market bear emerges from the bulls as Academy’s Tchir sounds a warning trib.al/Puy1M6L

item.title: 风险投资公司 Hack VC 募集了 1.5 亿美元的基金，专门用于加密货币行业。
item.description: Venture firm Hack VC raised a $150 million fund dedicated to the crypto industry. trib.al/QrYxNDb

item.title: 一艘载有俄罗斯旗舰产品乌拉尔原油的超级油轮已抵达委内瑞拉海岸，莫斯科正在加紧制裁和红海供应中断的情况下寻找新的买家。
item.description: A supertanker carrying Russia’s flagship Urals crude has arrived off the coast of Venezuela as Moscow looks for new buyers amid tightening sanctions and disruptions in the Red Sea trib.al/Nb61CPr

item.title: 消息人士称，阿布扎比主权财富基金穆巴达拉（Mubadala）正在考虑购买伦敦希思罗机场的股份
item.description: Abu Dhabi’s sovereign wealth fund Mubadala is considering buying a stake in London's Heathrow airport, sources say trib.al/puTQyY8

item.title: 美国最高法院驳回了一项可能会颠覆 1.4 万亿美元杠杆贷款市场的上诉，使摩根大通和其他银行在法律上的胜利保持不变。
item.description: The US Supreme Court turned away an appeal that might have upended the $1.4 trillion leveraged loan market, leaving intact a legal victory for JPMorgan Chase and other banks. trib.al/Fbny09I

item.title: 美国正在引领全球并购的复兴，而许多交易商认为这要到今年晚些时候才会出现
item.description: The US is leading a revival in global mergers and acquisitions that many dealmakers didn’t think would emerge until later in the year trib.al/SwmST21

item.title: 据消息人士称，包括 Advent 和 Blackstone 在内的一些全球最大的收购公司正在围攻法国制药巨头赛诺菲的消费者健康部门
item.description: Some of the world’s largest buyout firms, including Advent and Blackstone, are circling the consumer health division of French pharmaceutical giant Sanofi, sources say trib.al/YuSCwGx

item.title: 破产的加密货币公司 3AC 和 FTX 从 Sam Altman 的 Worldcoin 140% 的涨幅中得到一些安慰
item.description: Bankrupt crypto firms 3AC and FTX are getting some relief from a 140% rally in Sam Altman's Worldcoin trib.al/stvxxwk

item.title: 埃克森公司承诺不会削减在圭亚那的勘探或生产计划，因为委内瑞拉总统尼古拉斯-马杜罗继续加强其在该地区的领土主张
item.description: Exxon pledged not to curtail exploration or production plans in Guyana as Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro continues to ramp up his territorial claims in the region trib.al/BGgamYZ

item.title: 希腊总理表示没有财政空间提供进一步的财政减免，但希腊农民仍驾驶拖拉机前往雅典，抗议活动不断升级
item.description: Greek farmers are escalating their protests by driving their tractors to Athens, even after the prime minister says there’s no fiscal space to offer further financial relief trib.al/qjJZRum

item.title: 消息人士称，中东和中国的主权财富基金正在洽谈联合投资麦当劳中国业务的事宜
item.description: Middle Eastern and Chinese sovereign wealth funds are in talks to jointly invest in McDonald’s China business, sources say trib.al/fnG7hon

item.title: "汽车界的空中客车 "正在酝酿之中，以帮助欧洲汽车制造商与中国竞争，抵御生存威胁
item.description: An "Airbus of autos" is being floated to help Europe’s carmakers compete with China and fend off existential threats trib.al/2vRBDTU

item.title: 加拿大的消费价格在今年年初有所回落，基本压力方面的进展可能会为加拿大央行在未来几个月开始考虑降息提供更多空间
item.description: Canada’s consumer prices eased at the start of this year, with progress on underlying pressures likely to give the Bank of Canada more room to start considering rate cuts in the coming months trib.al/9igSkqi

item.title: 乌克兰表示，由于与波兰在农产品运输问题上的争执阻断了与欧盟的陆地边界，乌克兰正计划增加一条途经多瑙河的路线，以将出口量提高到战前水平
item.description: Ukraine said it’s planning an additional route via the Danube River to boost exports to pre-war levels as a spat with Poland over agricultural deliveries blocks a land border with the European Union trib.al/dBHMHcE

item.title: 俄罗斯能源部的数据显示，俄罗斯 1 月份实现了削减原油出口的目标，履行了对欧佩克+盟国的承诺
item.description: Russia met its target for crude-export cuts in January, complying with its pledge to allies in OPEC+, according to data from the country’s Energy Ministry trib.al/wCcQiGT

item.title: 欧洲议会议员也难逃养老金通胀问题
item.description: Even MEPs Can’t Escape Pension Inflation Problem trib.al/yQ5CK3e

item.title: 南非正考虑动用应急储备基金帮助弥补预算赤字
item.description: South Africa is considering using its contingency reserve fund to help fund its budget deficit trib.al/AhRDssy

item.title: Rivian 早就失去了成为特斯拉最可信竞争对手的资格。现在，它能否驾驭电动汽车需求的放缓，是对其最大的考验
item.description: Rivian lost its claim to be Tesla’s most credible competitor long ago. Now, its ability to navigate an EV demand slowdown poses its biggest test trib.al/gtdYcvf

item.title: Capital One 收购 Discover Financial 的交易将使两家最大的信用卡公司合并在一起。以下是您需要了解的所有信息
item.description: Capital One's deal to buy Discover Financial will bring together two of the biggest credit card firms. Here's all you need to know trib.al/zifC1O4

item.title:
"显然，我们并不需要通胀率回到目标值后才降息"
行长安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）向国会议员介绍英格兰银行在降息前希望看到的结果
item.description:
"We don't need, obviously, inflation to come back to target before we cut interest rates"

Governor Andrew Bailey tells MPs what the Bank of England wants to see before rates come down trib.al/V5aPIHj

item.title: 计划建造世界最高住宅楼的阿联酋开发商正寻求首次在债券市场融资
item.description: The UAE developer planning the world’s tallest residential tower is looking to raise money in the bond market for the first time trib.al/Sc9tq8z
